title: Gigi and Bella Hadid Perfect the Cool Mom and Aunt Look
summary:
Photo: Splash NewsBehold, cool mom Gigi Hadid and cool aunt Bella, who stepped out yesterday in New York City.
Gigi wore an oversized, men’s style black jacket that she topped off with a newsboy’s cap by Brixton.
Her sister, Bella, went her traditional ’90s-style look, throwing on a long black Matrix-style leather coat and chunky leather boots.
It seems like Gigi has taken a cue from Bella by throwing on a city-ready black look.
Now, her current outfit seems as if it were plucked from the wardrobe of her Y2K-loving sister.
paragraphs: Behold, cool mom Gigi Hadid and cool aunt Bella, who stepped out yesterday in New York City. While pushing a stroller downtown, the two sisters opted for two variations on all-black. Gigi wore an oversized, men’s style black jacket that she topped off with a newsboy’s cap by Brixton. (A denim jacket with an embroidered collar peekaboo-ed out from underneath the black one.) For a chic, maternal touch, she pushed the stroller with a pair of camel hued gloves and had a black diaper bag slung over her shoulder. Her sister, Bella, went her traditional ’90s-style look, throwing on a long black Matrix-style leather coat and chunky leather boots. She wore a scarf around her face, for a not-quite incognito twist.

It seems like Gigi has taken a cue from Bella by throwing on a city-ready black look. The supermodel tends to favor color. In late November, she posted her first photo with her little one on Instagram while wearing a knit robe with a leopard print baby carrier along with a baby blue sweatsuit. Now, her current outfit seems as if it were plucked from the wardrobe of her Y2K-loving sister. But clothing aside, it’s nice to see the two enjoy some stylish sister time.
